wikipedia_page.main: Christopher Skudder (born 1959) is a British broadcast journalist, and sports presenter with ITV.

response: Among other alumni, BBC Radio 2 presenter Jeremy Vine took a presentation and production course aged 17 before going to university, Chris Skudder of Sky Sports studied journalism, and so did Lisa Aziz, who became one of the first Asian presenters on British television.
